text: @realDonaldTrump @POTUS That’s hilarious, “great Vice President.”  You did not address the Coronavirus until Senator Schumer criticized you for not having a plan.  POTUS should be proactive, you obviously are reactive when someone tweets about it.  Someone who lies as much as you do is hard to believe.

entity.name: President Trump puts VP Pence in charge of US response to coronavirus
entity.description: Donald Trump said the risk to the US from the deadly coronavirus “remains very low” and that he has put Vice President Mike Pence in charge of the American response to the outbreak.
